message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. It's a great deal for both of us!
I'm getting close to my budget, Alice. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
